log(2) (dig = 100 000 000)

Distirbution of difference's digits with different values of |p-q|

pq=1 (e.g. p=0, q=1) -> {524.875,{45000972,5001848,0,0,0,0,0,0,5001785,44995395}}
pq=2 (e.g. p=0, q=2) -> {595.953,{39978164,5000308,5000878,0,0,0,0,5001795,5000308,40018547}}
pq=3 (e.g. p=0, q=3) -> {528.078,{39987993,0,4998310,4996861,0,0,5002877,4998309,0,40015650}}
pq=4 (e.g. p=0, q=4) -> {454.438,{40005672,0,0,5000007,4999879,5001179,5000007,0,0,39993256}}
pq=5 (e.g. p=0, q=5) -> {557.5,{39993938,0,0,0,9998600,10001186,0,0,0,40006276}}
